title: Wrong Guy, Right Room
description: Neil and Kaitlyn’s meet-cute is straight out of a romance novel, except for the lack of hot sex. He wants to wait until their wedding night and make it special, but she’s not so sure. Neil’s gesture would be romantic if the love of her life, Luke, hadn’t abandoned her ten years earlier, leaving a string of ghastly relationships in his wake.The night before Kaitlyn’s rehearsal dinner, her twin brother fills her head with images of erectile dysfunction and deformed penises, sending her to seduce Neil before it’s too late. However, when Kaitlyn sneaks into his hotel room ready to uncover their chemistry, she discovers something unexpected.Wrong Guy, Right Room is a stand-alone contemporary romance where the wrong guy might just be the right man.
author: Michelle Angelle
